products.title: Yak Cheese
products.description: Rich and creamy cheese made from yak milk, sourced from high-altitude Himalayan regions. Known for its unique flavor and smooth texture, this cheese is a favorite among cheese enthusiasts.
products.shortDescription: Creamy yak milk cheese with a rich flavor.

products.title: Smokey Cheese
products.description: Smooth cheese infused with a distinct smoky flavor, crafted through a traditional smoking process. Perfect for grilling, sandwiches, or as a bold addition to cheese platters.
products.shortDescription: Smooth cheese with a smoky flavor.

products.title: Kanchan Cheese
products.description: A mild and versatile cheese with a smooth texture, suitable for everyday use in sandwiches, cooking, or as a table cheese. Loved for its subtle flavor and creamy consistency.

products.title: Kanchan Sharp
products.description: An aged cheese with a bold, sharp taste, crafted for cheese enthusiasts who enjoy intense flavors. Perfect for grating over dishes or enjoying on its own.
products.shortDescription: Aged cheese with a sharp taste.

products.title: Mozzarella
products.description: Soft and stretchy mozzarella cheese, crafted for perfect melting. Ideal for pizzas, pastas, and Italian dishes, offering a creamy texture and mild flavor.
products.shortDescription: Soft mozzarella for pizzas and pastas.

products.title: Feta Cheese
products.description: Crumbly and tangy feta cheese, perfect for salads, Mediterranean dishes, or as a topping. Made with traditional methods for an authentic taste.

products.title: Parmesan Cheese
products.description: Hard, granular cheese with a nutty and savory flavor, aged to perfection. Ideal for grating over pastas, soups, or salads for an extra depth of taste.

products.title: Cheddar Cheese
products.description: Classic cheddar with a rich, sharp taste and smooth texture. Perfect for sandwiches, burgers, or as a snack, offering a robust flavor profile.

products.title: Amul Mozzarella
products.description: High-quality mozzarella from Amul, designed for excellent melting properties. Perfect for pizzas, lasagnas, and other dishes requiring a gooey cheese texture.

products.title: Amul Slice Cheese
products.description: Convenient cheese slices from Amul, perfect for quick snacks, sandwiches, or burgers. Offers a creamy texture and mild flavor for everyday use.

products.title: Amul Spread Cheese
products.description: Creamy and spreadable cheese from Amul, ideal for breads, crackers, or as a dip. Offers a smooth texture and rich flavor for versatile use.

products.title: Goat Cheese
products.description: Tangy and creamy goat cheese, crafted for gourmet dishes. Perfect for salads, appetizers, or as a spread, offering a distinctive flavor.
products.shortDescription: Tangy goat cheese for gourmet dishes.

products.title: Blue Cheese
products.description: Bold and tangy blue cheese with a creamy texture and distinctive veining. Ideal for gourmet dishes, salads, or cheese boards for a robust flavor.
products.shortDescription: Bold blue cheese for gourmet dishes.

reviews.name: Sarita Shrestha
reviews.text: The Yak Cheese is absolutely divine! Perfect texture and flavor.

reviews.name: Rajesh Thapa
reviews.text: Love the quick service and the quality of Mozzarella is unmatched.

reviews.name: Anita Gurung
reviews.text: The Smokey Cheese adds such a great flavor to my dishes!

reviews.name: Suman Lama
reviews.text: Feta Cheese is perfect for my salads, fresh and tangy!
